text:
I tried writing jpeg data from servlet and jsp both both the case i have set 
content as Image/Jpeg
error like nopilot found always come in client side
i wish to make JSP to act as image or zip file is any way possible
thank you
creator: myaneel@hotmail.com
remm@apache.org
text:
Jasper cannot, at the moment, generate binaries (the output is done as
characters, and thus will go through a wasteful and dangerous character
conversion phase).
You should use a servlet for this, as this was designed for that (unlike JSPs).
